entry.p: Brad Feld links to the agile software development manifesto, which reads in part:

blockquote.p: We are uncovering better ways of developing software by doing it and helping others do it. Through this work we have come to value:

ul.li: Individuals and interactions over processes and tools.
Responding to change over following a plan.

blockquote.p: That is, while there is value in the items on the right, we value the items on the left more.
